name: ShapeVS (Alpha Demo)
description:
ShapeVS is a fast paced, action packed, local multiplayer extravaganza for up to 4 players. Featuring 12 different games ranging from top down arena shooters to endless runners.

Note: Game requires 2 minimum to play

The ShapeVS demo includes 4 of the 12 games that are planned for the games release:

Shape Battle - It’s time for an old school top down bout, battle it out across multiple maps using a variety of weapons. Out-manoeuvre the competition to claim victory from the jaws of defeat.

Shape Fly - Get into the rhythm! Watch your line and avoid the obstacles, the last one standing wins. Keep an eye out for all manner of hazards coming at you.

Shape Move - There are stars that need collecting and hazards falling from the sky. Collect as many as you can in the time limit,  get hit and you can lose points, jump around, get the power ups and catch the stars.

Shape Zone - King of the Hill meets Platform Shooter! Battle it out for control of the zone, use power ups to help gain that winning edge. Shoot other players to stun them away and keep the zone for yourself.

Recommended that players use controllers, the game has been designed with controllers* in mind though two players can use keyboard controls.

*Keybindings are based of Xbox Controllers and can vary

See the ShapeVS Demo Screenshot in the files for more info.

As the game is in alpha the demo features incomplete audio and may include some bugs. Please use the comment section or join our socials if you find anything.

IMPORTANT: This game is currently in development, local multiplayer only, as this is a multiplayer game the purpose of this demo is for balancing and feedback. Follow us on our socials or join our Discord to join in the discussion.
